data.message: The new font stylings are obnoxious. Half the posts are yelling at me.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Josh. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2cypVMv. -Rhea

Facebook you could get rid of sponsored pages.
All they are are click bait with malware on the other end half the time.
You are willingly aiding in infecting your users systems with malware that could be used to glean personal information and aide with identity theft.
Keir, that has nothing to do with my concern here.
@jean-paul your facebook experience doesn't matter as long as the advertisers pay their bills

We're sorry you feel that way, Keir.  We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Rhea
